summary: German commander Captain Hauptmann Stransky (Maximilian Schell) places a squad in extreme danger after Sergeant Rolf Steiner (James Coburn) refuses to lie for him.
cast: James Coburn|Maximilian Schell|James Mason|David Warner|Klaus Löwitsch|Vadim Glowna|Roger Fritz|Dieter Schidor|Burkhard Driest|Fred Stillkrauth|Michael Nowka|Véronique Vendell|Arthur Brauss|Senta Berger|Demeter Bitenc|Thomas Braut|Heinz Engelmann|Igor Galo|Katherine Haber|Wolf C. Hartwig|Wolfgang Hess|Adolf Hitler|Sweeney MacArthur|Ivica Pajer|Thomas Piper|Hermina Pipinic|Nedim Prohic|Robert Rietty|Dragomir Stanojevic|Slavko Stimac|Vladan Zivkovic
title: La Cruz de Hierro
